content: first st chain 15 skip 2 sts single_crochet in the next st single_crochet into the next 17 sts chain 15 skip 2 sts single_crochet into the remaining sts in the round slip_stitch into first stitch of this round r5 slip_stitch into the bottom of the of the first chain 15 slip_stitch in each chain st up the handle slip_stitch in next st and each one around until you reach the next handle slip_stitch in each chain st up the handle slip_stitch the remaining sts in the round cut yarn and fasten_off weave in all ends modifications if you would like to use the two-handled basket to place a round potted plant in do not make the decreases in the opening evenly single_crochet 3 rounds and then complete the handles as directed in r4-r5 except you will now single_crochet into the next 24 sts instead of 17 between the handles finished piece will have a diameter of approx 4-5 and a height of 4-5 when sitting flat if you have any questions during the making of this pattern please email me directly at knotholecrochet@gmail com terms and conditions written pattern and the images in this pattern and it s listings may not be replicated printed and sold sold digitally used for personal gain or claimed as your own work it is protected by copyright and anyone who violates these terms will be subject to the law you may sell your finished product in person and online when selling online please include these two things in your listing * a link to the pattern via ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hanging-nest-basket * the words pattern written and designed by amanda corvello i would also love to see your finished work so please visit me on instagram @amandacorvellodesigns and use the hashtag #amandacorvellodesigns
